mapper.update:
update SYS_ORDER_LOG
ORDER_LOG_LOGINNAME = #{orderLogLoginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_LOG_USERNAME = #{orderLogUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_LOG_PHONE = #{orderLogPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_LOG_CLIENT = #{orderLogClient,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_LOG_NUMBER = #{orderLogNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SCENIC_SPOT_NAME = #{scenicSpotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_LOG_REASON = #{orderLogReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ORDER_LOG_ID = #{orderLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_ORDER_LOG set ORDER_LOG_LOGINNAME = #{orderLogLoginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_LOG_USERNAME = #{orderLogUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_LOG_PHONE = #{orderLogPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_LOG_CLIENT = #{orderLogClient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_LOG_NUMBER = #{orderLogNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPOSIT_MONEY = #{depositMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENIC_SPOT_NAME = #{scenicSpotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_LOG_REASON = #{orderLogReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETURN_RESULT_CODE = #{returnResultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORDER_LOG_ID = #{orderLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from SYS_ORDER_LOG where ORDER_LOG_NUMBER = #{OrderLogNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEPOSIT_MONEY like "%退调度费%" and RETURN_RESULT_CODE like "SUCCESS"

select sol.CREATE_DATE as refundTime,sol.ORDER_LOG_NUMBER as relateOrderNo,sol.RETURN_RESULT_CODE as refundStatus,sol.DEPOSIT_MONEY as amountRefund,so.USER_ID as userId,so.ORDER_ID as orderId,so.ORDER_STATUS as orderStatus from SYS_ORDER_LOG sol left join SYS_ORDER so on sol.ORDER_LOG_NUMBER = so.ORDER_NUMBER where sol.ORDER_LOG_NUMBER = #{orderNumber}
